TEXT.English: Lead Troops as a Great General
TEXT.French: Diriger les troupes en tant que Seigneur de guerre
TEXT.Spanish: Liderar tropas como un Gran General

TEXT.English: Great Generals can be used to either recruit units, build a Command Post in a city, or be added to another unit to increase its strength and the rate it gains experience points from combat. The recruit ability offers a quick random assortment of units, but the Command Post tends to have a better long term effect. A general that is joined with a unit can always be split from the unit later on and used for other purposes, or joined to a different unit.
